fittingDataXLSX¶

dataFitting.fittingDataXLSX(fittingData, label, participant, outputFolder, fileNameGen)[source]¶

Saves the fitting data to an XLSX file

Parameters:
  • fittingData (dict, optional) – Dictionary of details of the different fits, including an ordered dictionary containing the parameter values tested, in the order they were tested, and a list of the fit qualities of these parameters.
  • label (basestring) – The label used to identify the fit in the file names
  • participant (dict) – The participant data
  • outputFolder (basestring) – The path of the output folder
  • fileNameGen (function) – Creates a new file with the name <handle> and the extension <extension>. It takes two string parameters: (handle, extension) and returns one fileName string

fitRecord
